name: Spacetime
description:
Made for the GameMakers Toolkit Jam.

Description:

A game about shooting turrets in space.

W A S D or arrow keys to move.

Left mouse button to shoot and right mouse button to shield.

If your shield gets hit it will reload your energy until the energybar is full.

If your cursor is over a turret and you press right mouse button you will select that turret and move around it.

Programs used:

  • Gamemaker: Studio
  • Gimp 2.0
  • Soundation
  • bfxr
